price: 10. Kasi na moto oyo akoyamba buku naye nasima ya mokongo naye,
arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā man ūtiya kitābahu warāa ẓahrihi
